title: NH3 equil. graph - what is true between t1 and t2

content.prompt: Which of the following was true for the system between time t1 and time t2?

choices.label: The number of effective collisions between H2 and N2 was zero.
The rates of the forward and reverse reactions were equal.
The rate of formation of NH3 molecules was equal to the rate of disappearance of H2 molecules.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
